definition: physical objects consisting of a number of pages bound together
details:
noun
- physical objects consisting of a number of pages bound together
= synonyms: book
- the magnitude of sound, usually in a specified direction
= example: the magnitude of sound, usually in a specified direction
= synonyms: loudness, intensity
- the property of something that is great in magnitude
= synonyms: mass
- a publication that is one of a set of several similar publications
= example: a publication that is one of a set of several similar publications
- the amount of 3-dimensional space occupied by an object
= example: the amount of 3-dimensional space occupied by an object
- a relative amount
= example: a relative amount
